Detailed Description

Class defition for user list object and some functions assign.

Create a user list object used in rooms, contact list and online list

Function Documentation

function INTERFACE_AddUser (   Username,
  Status,
  Rating,
  Type 
)

Add one user in list.

Add a user in user list creating a tr element and insert it in (this.users) array.

Parameters:
Username User's name
Status User's status
Rating User's rating that will be show
Type User's type (teacher, admin, robot, etc.)
Returns:
none
Author:
Rubens Suguimoto
See also:
INTERFACE_CreateUser

function INTERFACE_CreateUser (   Username,
  Status,
  Rating,
  Type 
)

Create a user item and return it.

Create a user tr element, contais username, status/type and rating, and return this element.

Parameters:
Username The user's name
Status The new user's status
Rating The user's rating
Type The new user's type
Author:
Rubens Suguimoto
Returns:
Tr HTML element with username, status/type and rating

function INTERFACE_UpdateUser (   Username,
  NewStatus,
  Rating,
  NewType 
)

Update user status and rating in list.

Update user status and rating in user list. Find the user and set his type status and, if exists rating, update rating;

Parameters:
Username User's name
NewStatus New user's status
Rating User's rating
NewType New user's type
Author:
Rubens Suguimoto
Returns:
False if user was not founded in list, else True
